modName: Mathews Cruel-Blood 100 Percent Complete Dark Brotherhood Qu
summary: All Nazir\'s contracts, all the main quests completed with the proper bonus, custom gear (sword, dagger,bow,armor,etc)Fully restored Dawstar sanctuary
descriptionHtml:
My second Save file, this is a complete save on the Dark Brotherhood Questline, 100% completed,including the ancient armor, all of Nazir\'s contracts, all of the main quests completed, with all the bonus they can grant, fully restored dawstar sanctuary.I haven\'t done any of the Night Mother\'s side quests, since they never end, so , none done.I allowed poor Cicero to live, sice he can prove a good follower later.
  

    All the character gear was enchanted by myself, no mod for the weapons, exept the dagger, if you want to know any off the mod used during my gameplay of the save, ask in the comments, to much to post it here.

     I also put on the chest on the masters bedroom, a stock full of alchemy ingredients and smithing materials.

*WARNING some cities might have high bounties, be careful when entering, expecialy Riften

NOTABLE SKILLS (level 41)

ENCHANTING 100
SMITHING 100
ONE HANDED 81
LIGHT ARMOR 86
ALCHEMY 100

(the other skills are quite basic levels)

     

      Thats it people, thanks for reading, endorse if you like it ;D
author: Mateus Rocha
